Event.name: Cause_to_rot
Event.definition: <def-root>An <fen>Patient</fen>, which is an organic substance, undergoes the natural process of decay due to a <fen>Cause</fen> (or <fen>Agent</fen>). <ex><fex name="Cause">Moisture</fex> <t>rotted</t> <fex name="Patient">the bread</fex>.</ex> </def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> intentionally brings about the decay of the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Depictive
Arg.definition: <def-root>A depictive phrase describing the actor of an action. </def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An act performed by an <fen>Agent</fen>, or a sub-event centered around a <fen>Cause</fen> that leads it to cause the <fen>Patient</fen> to rot.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment>presumptuously, coldly, deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the Cause causes the <fex name="Patient">Patient</fex> to rot.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The location at which the <fen>Cause</fen> acts upon the <fen>Patient</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>An event which causes the <fen>Patient</fen> to rot.</def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> may use an instrument to bring about the rotting.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: rot.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: bring about decay in (organic matter).
